text: Donbas Arena was a football stadium in Donetsk in Ukraine. It was home to the club F.C. Shakhtar Donetsk. It could hold up to 51,504 people. It was the biggest club stadium in Ukraine. It was closed in 2014 due to war in Donbas. == References == == Other websites == * Donbass Arena official website * Rinat Akhmetov: The new stadium's name is Donbass Arena Category:2009 establishments in Europe Category:21st-century establishments in Ukraine Category:Football stadiums in Europe Category:Football in Ukraine Category:Buildings and structures in Ukraine Category:Donetsk
title: Donbas Arena
